long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
👉 Notionicon is an icon search library designed specifically for Notion users, making your Notion pages more vibrant and personalized. With Notionicon, you can easily and quickly search for and use high-quality icons, enhancing the attractiveness and visual appeal of your workspace.

🔑 Key Features

1️⃣ Extensive Icon Library: Access a vast library of icons, including thousands of icons in various styles and categories to meet all your needs.

2️⃣ One-Click Search: Built-in powerful search functionality allows you to easily find the icons you need without leaving your Notion page.

3️⃣ Quick Insertion: Insert the selected icon into your Notion page with just one click, boosting your productivity.

4️⃣ Seamless Integration: All operations are completed within Notion without switching applications, providing a smooth user experience.

5️⃣ Constant Updates: Our icon library is regularly updated to ensure you always have the latest and most popular icon selections.

——————————————

≡ Upcoming Features

1️⃣ Customization: Your very own icon library.

2️⃣ AI Generation: Use AI to generate icons you like in real-time!
